name: AE-Canfield
description:
The best Canfield solitaire for iPhone, AE Canfield!

Any feedback please emails us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

This Canfield solitaire offers two draw modes and two scoring modes.

Smooth game play, awesome vivid sound as well as extremely beautiful graphics, which makes this Canfield game more fun than ever.

The main purpose of the game is have 4 foundations with 13 cards in each suit and in ascending order.Initially, 13 cards are dealt as Reserve with the top card face up, and one card will be placed on the first of the Foundations as base card, 4 cards dealt for the four piles of Tableau, each pile with one card face up. The remaining cards keeps in Stock and face down, they can be dealt to Waste during game play.
Move cards to cascades in descending order with alternating colors. Unlimited Redeals allowed in Standard mode.

If you like classic card and casino games like Solitaire, Texas Poker, Spider, FreeCell, UNO, klondike, Hearts, Blackjack, Video Poker, you shouldn't miss this game!

Get it now! Enjoy yourself!
